itemListElement.name: Potato Spinach or Rainbow Chard stir fry. Aloo Palak. Vegan Potato Spinach Stir Fry

@graph.name: Potato Spinach or Rainbow Chard stir fry. Aloo Palak. Vegan Potato Spinach Stir Fry
@graph.description: Potato Spinach Stir Fry. Aloo Palak Indian Recipe. Easy Spinach and potato side. Use other greens as rainbow chard, mustard greens. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe. Serves 2 to 4
recipeIngredient: 1  green chili chopped (Serrano or bird's eye)
2 cups chopped greens- Spinach or rainbow chard

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil and heat on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add oil and heat on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cumin seeds, ginger, garlic and chili and cook until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cumin seeds, ginger, garlic and chili and cook until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onions and cook until translucent. 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onions and cook until translucent. 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add potatoes, mix well and saute for a minute
recipeInstructions.name: Add potatoes, mix well and saute for a minute

recipeInstructions.text: Add greens, mix and cook covered on low heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add greens, mix and cook covered on low heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add salt after 10-15 minutes and stir well. You can also add tomatoes at this point instead of earlier, for chunky tomatoes version.
recipeInstructions.name: Add salt after 10-15 minutes and stir well. You can also add tomatoes at this point instead of earlier, for chunky tomatoes version.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook until potatoes are tender. another 10-15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook until potatoes are tender. another 10-15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with paprika or chili powder. Serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with paprika or chili powder. Serve hot.
